p: The synthesized compounds 1a-c, Cu-Nps, and Cu-Nps -Pyr (1a-1c) were screened for cytotoxic activity, and we followed the methods of Surendra Kumar et al. [ 27, 29]. The 100 μM (MTT anticancer assay) concentration treated with test compounds for 48 h was used by three cell lines (HepG2, HeLa, and MCF-7), and standard of doxorubicin was selected in this screening.
